SECTION_INTRO.TITLE: Introduction
SECTION_INTRO.A: WOM - “Worth One Minute” is a general-purpose rewarding platform based on a voucher exchange system. Many actions and activities made by individuals have an intrinsic social value, an effect known as “positive externalities” in economics. WOM aims to recognize all those actions that are a socially valuable contribution to a common goal and reward the time people dedicate to them by generating social digital vouchers. WOM vouchers reward every minute of a social effort.
SECTION_INTRO.B: The WOM platform is implemented and managed by DIGIT srl. DIGIT srl is a spin-off of the University of Urbino that aims to create social value through digital awareness. It is founded on the conviction that the core of technology, platforms and, software need to be in the interest of human people and society and that social and digital innovation are related. WOM is only one of the social projects of DIGIT srl.

SECTION_VOL.TITLE: Volunteers
SECTION_VOL.MESSAGE: By making socially valuable actions, every user gains WOM and becomes a Volunteer. Volunteers can manage their WOM vouchers by a mobile app, the “WOM Pocket”. They can install it on their device. The application allows volunteers to gather their vouchers, store them, and spend them.

SECTION_MERCH.TITLE: Merchant
SECTION_MERCH.MESSAGE: Local shops can take part in the project by becoming Merchants. Merchants are system components that can create payment instances. They can accept WOM vouchers in exchange for services and discounts. Merchants use a different application, the “WOM POS”, or a custom integration software. These software components allow merchants to create new transactions, applying filters to collected WOM vouchers.

SECTION_INSTR.TITLE: Instrument
SECTION_INSTR.MESSAGE: Instruments are owners of social activities or an initiative with a social aim recognized by the platform. Instruments allow volunteers to take social actions. Owners of this type of activity, such as non-profit organizations, associations, or private individuals, may contact info@wom.social to be evaluated by the platform’s ethical committee and added to the list of WOM Instruments that can generate vouchers and reward contributors.

SECTION_REG.TITLE: Registry
SECTION_REG.MESSAGE: The Registry is the central entity that generates WOMs requested by an Instrument, it verifies their authenticity when they are used by a Merchant and it makes sure they can’t be duplicated or used twice.

SECTION_TECH.TITLE: Technical
SECTION_TECH.MESSAGE: WOM is an open technology provided as open source software, released under the MIT license. It is developed in the open on GitHub, take a look.

SECTION_CONTACT.TITLE: Stay in touch! 📫
SECTION_CONTACT.MESSAGE: To develop new WOM integrations, POS connectors, or any other inquiry, please contact info@wom.social.

SECTION_A.A: WOM stands for Worth One Minute and is a general-purpose rewarding platform based on a voucher exchange system that rewards the positive impact of actions and activities done by people that contribute to a common good.
SECTION_A.B: Many actions have an intrinsic social value, an effect known as “positive externalities” in economics. WOM recognizes the impact of those actions and provides a tool to reward these positive externalities by issuing WOMs.

SECTION_A_2.TITLE: What are WOMs
SECTION_A_2.A: WOMs are digital vouchers designed to recognize the value of actions having such a positive effect. Each WOM voucher rewards one minute of socially-valuable effort performed by an individual.
SECTION_A_2.B: The WOMs vouchers are anonymous. The only data they store is related to their social purpose and where and when they generate. WOM vouchers do not have value in “real” fiat money. They are proof of a socially-valuable effort that an individual contributed towards a shared cause.
SECTION_A_2.C: The Registry manages the voucher exchange and keeps track of the creation and consumption of WOMs. The WOM platform is a centralized system. The Registry represents the authority that manages the exchange of cryptographic keys (which allow the secure exchange of information) and verifies that vouchers are earned and spent correctly. The Registry does not store the identity of users and their data. WOM vouchers are anonymous, and their use is not tracked.

SECTION_B.TITLE: How do I earn WOMs?
SECTION_B.A: WOM vouchers are gained by voluntarily performing socially-valuable work. Each minute of effort is worth one WOM. For the generation of WOM, the performed activity must be officially recognized by the WOM platform.
SECTION_B.B: To be recognized, activity or initiative must be evaluated as socially valuable and thus approved by the WOM platform ethical committee.

SECTION_C.TITLE: How do I use my WOMs?
SECTION_C.A: Business owners, shopkeepers, public entities, or any other private citizen (generically called Merchants) may freely decide to provide goods, services, or discounts to owners of WOM vouchers. To do so, they create a WOM payment that allows them to choose which kind of effort to reward: WOM vouchers can be filtered by purpose, location, and time. Goods, services, and discounts can be determined freely by the Merchant.

SECTION_A.A: This section is dedicated to WOM for Urbino, the project that, since may 2022, has been launched in the city of Urbino. WOM for Urbino is the first experimentation platform for the WOM proejct. The choice of Urbino as the first city to use WOM comes from the collaboration with DIGIT srl, University of Urbino and City of Urbino, which gave us its patronage.
SECTION_A.B: The project launched on 4 may 2022 during a press conference (you can see the conference Clicking here). Right now citizens, students and turists have various possibilities to obtain WOM and use them to obtain discounts in stores conventioned with the project.

CITIZENS.TITLE: CITIZENS
CITIZENS.PAGE_DESCR:
WOM is the platform adopted by Pesaro Italian Capital of Culture 2024 to recognize the value of your participation.

Find out how it works and what opportunities it offers you
CITIZENS.DOWNLOAD_GUIDE: Download the guide in PDF version.
CITIZENS.SECTION_WOM_FOR_PESARO2024_DESCR:
The City of Pesaro, as part of Pesaro 2024 and on the initiative of the Casa della Tecnologie Emergenti, has adopted the WOM digital platform for the active involvement of citizens and tourists. Anyone who participates in cultural initiatives or visits the Pesaro 2024 sites can earn points, called WOM, which attest to the social value generated by participation.

Each WOM corresponds to one minute of engagement. WOM have no monetary counter value, but are recognised as vouchers by those who wish to reward those who have earned them. Merchants, shopkeepers, public and private organisations can freely decide to grant discounts or concessions on goods and services to WOM holders. The amount of the discount granted and the number of WOMs required to obtain it are at the sole discretion of each shopkeeper, who can set up offers and make them immediately visible on the WOM Pocket application.

At the Civic Museums and Casa Rossini you can also get reductions and free admission on the Card Pesaro Capitale.

The widespread use of WOM encourages social cohesion, active participation in actions of collective interest, and awareness of the value of one's actions.
CITIZENS.SECTION_WOM_POCKET: WOM Pocket (the app for collecting and using WOM)
CITIZENS.SECTION_WOM_POCKET_DESCR:
WOM Pocket is a free app available for Android and iOS that you can freely install without any form of registration. The app allows you to collect and use WOM by scanning specific QRcodes associated with places, events, or actions that contribute to the creation of social value.

The application does not process personal data and guarantees users' anonymity. Your WOM collection is stored exclusively on your device.

By downloading WOM Pocket you have the opportunity to earn WOM by visiting museums and cultural venues, participating in Pesaro 2024 events and in many other ways that you will have the opportunity to discover. You can use your WOM to enjoy discounts and concessions at participating stores and to purchase the Pesaro Capitale Card at a reduced price!

Using WOM Pocket is simple. In the following tutorials you will find all the instructions for installing and using the app.
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL1: Tutorial 1: Install and open the WOM Pocket app.
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL1_1_DESCR: Install the WOM Pocket app available in the App Store and Play Store
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL1_2_DESCR: Scroll through the screens of the tutorial.
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL1_3_DESCR: When asked, allow the app to access geolocation (needed to place your WOMs on the map) and camera (needed to earn and use WOMs by scanning QRcodes)
CITIZENS.SECTION_INTERFACCIA_WOM_POCKET_DESCR: The app has 4 sections, navigable from the bottom bar
CITIZENS.SECTION_INTERFACCIA_WOM_POCKET_1: Home, where you will find the number of WOMs available to you, a map of your WOMs, and a list of the latest transactions. This section is initially empty, but it features the Scan button, which allows you to earn and use WOM, as described in the next tutorials.
CITIZENS.SECTION_INTERFACCIA_WOM_POCKET_2: Offers, where you find all the active offers nearby, in order of distance. In the upper right corner you will find a link to the offer map.
CITIZENS.SECTION_INTERFACCIA_WOM_POCKET_3: Exchange, which allows you to donate up to 60 WOMs per day to express your gratitude to those who perform actions that you believe are beneficial to the community
CITIZENS.SECTION_INTERFACCIA_WOM_POCKET_4: Settings, which you may not use for now.
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_DESCR_A: You can get WOM in so many ways after downloading the app:
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_A_1: Visiting the cultural sites of Pesaro 2024 - small QRcodes worth 15 WOM are posted in front of Pesaro's buildings and monuments
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_A_2: Visiting the museums of Pesaro - inside the museums are displayed QRcodes that are worth 60 WOM
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_A_3: Participating in Pesaro 2024 events - each event is associated with a specific QRcode that gives value to your participation
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_A_4: Walking - follow Tutorial 5 to find out how to use WOM Contapassi
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_A_5: In many other ways that you will gradually discover...
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_DESCR_B: On all occasions you can get WOM:
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_B_1: Search a Pesaro 2024 QRcode (like the one below)
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_B_5: You will see appear in your app the WOMs you have earned.
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_B_6: Scan this invitation QRcode now and earn your first 15 WOMs!.
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_2: Click on "Offerte" to see active deals in your vicinity. If there are no active offers where you are, you can view offers in other cities
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_3: Click on "Vedi mappa" to access the Map of offerings in the area
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_4: Go to an affiliated store (you will be able to recognize it by the special sticker "QUI SI ACCETTANO WOM")
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_5: Ask to use WOM to access the scheduled offer. The merchant will show you the QRcode and PIN for the offer (as shown in the figure)
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_6: Open the WOM Pocket app and click on "Scansiona".
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_7: Frame the QRcode, enter the PIN and confirm the transaction
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_8: Show the shopkeeper the screen with the green confirmation checkmark
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_9: You are now entitled to the discount!
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_DESCR_IMG: Facsimile of the QRcode that you will need to framewith WOM Pocket app to access the offer
CITIZENS.SECTION_STICKER_DESCR_IMG: Sticker that you will find on the windows of participating stores
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL4_DESCR: With the WOM Contapassi app, you can earn WOM by walking, because exercise is about staying fit and individual well-being is a value to the community.
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL4_1: Download the WOM Contapassi app available in the App Store and Play Store
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL4_2: Allow the app to access data from Google Fit or Health in case of iOS
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL4_3: You will start earning WOM once you pass 3000 steps
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL4_4: Receive your WOMs from the next day.
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL5_2: The history screen will open, click on the gray icon and wait for it to turn green
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL5_3: Click on the green icon to view the QRcode and PIN to get your WOMs
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL5_4: Click on the QRcode, you will be redirected to WOM Pocket app.
CITIZENS.SECTION_TUTORIAL5_5: Enter the PIN associated with the QRcode and earn your WOMs
CITIZENS.SECTION_FAQ: FAQ: Answers to frequently asked questions
CITIZENS.SECTION_FAQ_1_D: Do I need to create an account to access WOM Pocket?
CITIZENS.SECTION_FAQ_1_R: No, the WOM platform and WOM Pocket app are completely anonymous. Therefore, your WOMs are only collected on your device. If you uninstall the app without transferring them you lose them.
CITIZENS.SECTION_FAQ_2_D: Can I move my WOMs from one device to another?
CITIZENS.SECTION_FAQ_2_R: Yes, you can transfer your WOMs by accessing the WOM Pocket app settings and starting the export process
CITIZENS.SECTION_FAQ_3_D: Do WOMs have an expiration date?
CITIZENS.SECTION_FAQ_3_R: No, WOMs always remain valid and remain stored in your WOM Pocket. Some merchants, however, may set up offers valid only for recent WOMs
CITIZENS.SECTION_FAQ_4_R: Each WOM is recognition of the value generated by your 1-minute effort. It has no monetary countervalue, but Pesaro Musei and many shopkeepers and merchants offer discounts and concessions to those who have WOM in appreciation.
CITIZENS.SECTION_FAQ_5_D: Can I use WOM only in Pesaro?
CITIZENS.SECTION_FAQ_5_R: No, you can look for other cities where there are contracted merchants, or propose yourself to use WOM in other cities.
CITIZENS.CONTACTS_DESCR: Stay updated on the project and follow us on Instagram and Facebook!

PESARO2024.TITLE: PESARO 2024
PESARO2024.SUBTITLE: The value of your participation in the Capital of Culture
PESARO2024.PAGE_DESCR: The City of Pesaro, through the initiative of the Casa delle Tecnologie Emergenti, has adopted the WOM platform to recognize and reward the value of active participation of citizens and tourists in the cultural initiatives of Pesaro Italian Capital of Culture 2024.
PESARO2024.SECTION_HOW_WORKS_DESCR:
Earn WOM by attending events, visiting cultural venues, doing socially useful actions, or adopting sustainable behaviors. Each WOM represents one minute of engagement. WOM have no monetary countervalue, but at the Musei Civici and Casa Rossini reductions and gratuities are valid on the Card Pesaro Capitale and are recognised as vouchers by artisans and shopkeepers who wish to reward those who contribute to the creation of social value with discounts or concessions.

WOM Pocket is the free app for Android and iOS that allows users to collect and use WOM while guaranteeing anonymity. See complete guides for tourists, citizens and Pesaro2024 volunteers and hoteliers.
PESARO2024.SECTION_HOW_TO_EARN_WOM_1_DESCR: Special QRcodes, such as the invitation one displayed below, are displayed at Pesaro 2024 venues and events. Scan them with WOM Pocket to earn as many WOM as the number of minutes it takes to attend the event or visit the venue. The invitation QRcode is worth 15 WOM, in recognition of the value you are creating in the minutes you spend reading this page, installing the app and experiencing how it works. Each QRcode can only be scanned once.
PESARO2024.SECTION_HOW_TO_EARN_WOM_2_DESCR: Check out the guides for tourists, citizens, Pesaro2024 volunteers and hoteliers to discover the many ways to earn WOM.
PESARO2024.SECTION_WHERE_TO_USE: Where can you use your WOMs?
PESARO2024.SECTION_WHERE_TO_USE_DESCR:
WOM have an important symbolic value: they represent your contribution to Pesaro 2024.
But in Pesaro you can also use WOM to access the discounts and concessions that tradesmen, craftsmen and shopkeepers spontaneously offer to those who have them, as a token of appreciation for the contribution made to Pesaro 2024 with their presence and participation. At the Civic Museums and Casa Rossini you can also get reductions and free admission on the Pesaro Capital Card. The list of offers is presented in the WOM Pocket app in reverse order of distance from your location. You can recognise shops with offers by seeing the WOM platform label displayed in the shop window.

If you are a shopkeeper/craftsman/shopkeeper, check out the guide and join the project!
PESARO2024.SECTION_ENDING_TEXT: Culture is a collective fact, which feeds on the participation of everyone. WOM recognises and rewards your contribution to the Italian Capital of Culture 2024.

TOURISTS.TITLE: TOURISTS
TOURISTS.PAGE_DESCR:
WOM is the platform Pesaro Italian Capital of Culture 2024 adopted to recognize the value of your participation.

Find out how it works and what opportunities it offers you
TOURISTS.DOWNLOAD_GUIDE: Download the guide in PDF version.
TOURISTS.SECTION_WOM_FOR_PESARO2024_DESCR:
The City of Pesaro, as part of Pesaro 2024 and through the initiative of the Casa della Tecnologie Emergenti, has adopted the WOM digital platform for the active involvement of citizens and tourists. Anyone who participates in cultural initiatives or visits Pesaro 2024 venues can earn points, called WOMs, which attest to the social value generated by participation.

Each WOM is worth one minute of engagement. WOMs have no monetary counter value, but those who wish to reward those who have earned them recognize WOMs as vouchers. Merchants, shopkeepers and public and private entities can freely decide to grant discounts or concessions on goods and services to WOM holders. The size of the discount given and the number of WOMs needed to obtain it are at the total discretion of each merchant, who can set up offers and make them immediately visible on the WOM Pocket application.

At Musei Civici and Casa Rossini, you can also have a discount or a free Pesaro Capitale Card inexchange for WOMs.

The widespread use of WOMs foosters social cohesion, active participation in actions of collective interest, and awareness of the value of one's actions.
TOURISTS.SECTION_WOM_POCKET: WOM Pocket (the app for collecting and using WOM)
TOURISTS.SECTION_WOM_POCKET_DESCR:
WOM Pocket is a free app available for Android and iOS that you can freely install without any form of registration. The app allows you to collect and use WOM by scanning specific QRcodes associated with places, events, or actions that contribute to creating social value.

The application does not process personal data and guarantees users' anonymity. Your WOM collection is stored exclusively on your device.

By downloading WOM Pocket, you can earn WOM by visiting museums and cultural venues and participating in Pesaro 2024 events. You can use your WOM to enjoy discounts and concessions at participating stores and to purchase the Pesaro Capitale Card at a reduced price!

Using WOM Pocket is simple. In the following tutorials, you will find all the instructions for installing and using the app.
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL1: Tutorial 1: Install and open the WOM Pocket app.
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL1_1_DESCR: Install the WOM Pocket app, available in the App Store and Play Store
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL1_2_DESCR: Scroll through the screens of the tutorial.
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL1_3_DESCR: When asked, allow the app to access geolocation (needed to place your WOMs on the map) and camera (required to earn and use WOMs by scanning QRcodes)
TOURISTS.SECTION_INTERFACCIA_WOM_POCKET_DESCR: The app has four sections, navigable from the bottom bar:
TOURISTS.SECTION_INTERFACCIA_WOM_POCKET_1: Home: where you will find the number of WOMs available, a map of your WOMs, and a list of the latest transactions. This section is initially empty, but it features the Scan button, which allows you to earn and use WOM, as described in the following tutorials.
TOURISTS.SECTION_INTERFACCIA_WOM_POCKET_2: Offers: where you can find all the active offers near your location in order of distance. You will find a link to the offer map in the upper right corner.
TOURISTS.SECTION_INTERFACCIA_WOM_POCKET_3: Exchange: which allows you to donate up to 60 WOMs per day to express your gratitude to those who perform actions that you believe are beneficial to the community
TOURISTS.SECTION_INTERFACCIA_WOM_POCKET_4: Settings: which you don't need to use for earning and using WOM.
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_DESCR_A: You can get WOM in so many ways after downloading the app:
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_A_1: Scanning the welcome QRcode - hotels and infopoints in Pesaro welcome you with 15 WOMs
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_A_2: Visiting the cultural sites of Pesaro 2024 - small QRcodes worth 15 WOM are posted in front of Pesaro's buildings and monuments.
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_A_3: Visiting the museums of Pesaro - inside the museums are displayed QRcodes that are worth 60 WOM
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_A_4: Participating in Pesaro 2024 events - each event is associated with a specific QRcode that gives value to your participation
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_A_5: Walking - follow Tutorial 5 to find out how to use WOM Stepcounter
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_DESCR_B: On all occasions, you can get WOM:
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_B_1: Search a Pesaro 2024 QRcode (like the one below)
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_B_5: You will see the WOMs you have earned appear in your app.
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL2_B_6: Scan this invitation QRcode now and earn your first 15 WOMs!.
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_2: Click on "Offerte" to see active deals in your vicinity. If there are no active offers where you are, you can view offers in other cities
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_3: Click on "Vedi mappa" to access the Map of offerings in the area
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_4: Go to an affiliated store (you will be able to recognize it by the special sticker "QUI SI ACCETTANO WOM")
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_5: Ask to use WOM to access the scheduled offer. The merchant will show you the QRcode and PIN for the offer (as shown in the figure)

TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_7: Frame the QRcode, enter the PIN, and confirm the transaction
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_8: Show the shopkeeper the screen with the green confirmation checkmark
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_9: You are now entitled to a discount!
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL3_DESCR_IMG: Facsimile of the QRcode that you will need to framewith WOM Pocket app to access the offer
TOURISTS.SECTION_STICKER_DESCR_IMG: Sticker that you will find on the windows of participating stores
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL4_DESCR: With the WOM Stepcounter app, you can earn WOM by walking, because exercise is about staying fit, and individual well-being is of value to the community.
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL4_1: Download the WOM Contapassi app available in the App Store and Play Store
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL4_2: Allow the app to access data from Google Fit or Health in the case of iOS
TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL4_3: You will start earning WOM once you pass 3000 steps

TOURISTS.SECTION_TUTORIAL5_5: Enter the PIN associated with the QRcode and earn your WOMs
TOURISTS.SECTION_FAQ: FAQ: Answers to frequently asked questions
TOURISTS.SECTION_FAQ_1_D: Do I need to create a WOM Pocket account to use the app?
TOURISTS.SECTION_FAQ_1_R: No, the WOM platform and the WOM Pocket app are entirely anonymous. It is for that that your WOMs are collected just on your smartphone. If you uninstall the WOM Pocket app without transferring all your WOMs, you will lose them.
TOURISTS.SECTION_FAQ_2_D: Can I transfer my WOMs from one smartphone to another?
TOURISTS.SECTION_FAQ_2_R: Yes. You can transfer your WOMs through the WOM Pocket app settings, starting the migration process.
TOURISTS.SECTION_FAQ_3_D: Do the WOMs have an expiration date?
TOURISTS.SECTION_FAQ_3_R: No, the WOMs are always valid. Just keep them in your WOM Pocket app. However, some merchants can choose to accept only recently gained WOMs.
TOURISTS.SECTION_FAQ_4_R: Every WOM is worth one minute of engagement. They don't have a monetary value, but Pesaro Musei and many merchants grant discounts or concessions on goods and services to WOM holders as a sign of gratitude.
TOURISTS.SECTION_FAQ_5_D: Can I use my WOMs just in the city of Pesaro?
TOURISTS.SECTION_FAQ_5_R: You can find afflicted merchants in other cities or bring WOM into your city.
TOURISTS.CONTACTS_DESCR: Stay tuned for thw WOM project, and follow us on Instagram and Facebook!

RETE-DELLE-RETI.TITLE: Rete delle Reti
RETE-DELLE-RETI.SUBTITLE: IN EVERY LIBRARY, THE BEST OF ITALIAN LIBRARIES

SECTION_A.TITLE: How does it work for users?
SECTION_A.A: Many actions and activities done by an individual contribute to a common good and have an intrinsic social value. By making those socially valuable actions, every user gains WOMs and becomes a Volunteer. Volunteers can use WOM vouchers to obtain services or goods provided by Merchants. Every Volunteer can collect all the vouchers gained on the app "WOM Pocket".

SECTION_B.TITLE: Pocket
SECTION_B.A: Volunteers can manage their WOM vouchers by a mobile app, the "WOM Pocket". This app allows users to collect their earned WOM vouchers, keep them (as if they were in a virtual “wallet”) and spend their vouchers. The WOM platform has no cost for the Volunteers and they can freely download the Pocket app from the Android and iOS stores.

SECTION_A.TITLE: Where do i spend my WOMs? How can I reward socially useful actions with WOMs?
SECTION_A.A: Merchants are system components that can create payment instances. They can accept WOM vouchers in exchange for the services and discounts they offer. Merchants can choose what type of vouchers they accept. They can choose: vouchers generated only for a given purpose (thus promoting that social purpose), those generated in a given geographical area (thus encouraging social actions in their reality territorial), or those generated in a defined time interval. The payment instances do not involve money exchanges but only discounts and gratuities.
SECTION_A.B: By accepting specific types of WOM vouchers, Merchants can indirectly contribute to a social campaign, encouraging citizens to contribute to the shared goal with their voluntary efforts. Also, merchants can increase their visibility to the community working towards the shared goal.
SECTION_A.C: Want to be a merchant? Download the WOM POS app on your mobile device.

SECTION_B.TITLE: POS
SECTION_B.A: The tool Merchants can use to accept WOM payment is the app “WOM POS” (Point of Sale) or a custom integration software. These software components allow merchants to create new transactions, applying filters to collected WOM vouchers.
SECTION_B.B: The WOM platform has no cost for the Merchant that wants to use it anonymously. Merchants can freely download the app POS from the Android and iOS stores. There are no transaction costs. If Merchants want to make their offers more visible and have periodic reports of the social value they have helped to generate, they can select paid services.

SECTION_A.TITLE: How can I generate WOMs?
SECTION_A.A: Instruments are system components recognized by the WOM platform and approved by an ethical committee. They can generate vouchers and reward contributors. All owners of social activity or an initiative that allows volunteers to take social action can become Instruments and add to the list of WOM Instruments.
SECTION_A.B: Each Instrument allows the pursuit of one of the social objectives identified by the WOM platform (for example, initiatives for public health, activities for the defense of social rights or the protection of the artistic and cultural heritage, etc.). These objectives are called aims.
SECTION_A.C: The placing on the platform of new Instruments for the release of WOMs has costs related to the review process by the ethics and technical committees, the development of the connectors, and the maintenance of the WOM generation service.

TERMS_CONDITIONS.MAIN_TEXT:
Welcome to the WOM platform!

 The following is in italian language only.  

I termini e le condizioni seguenti indicano regole e normative per l’utilizzo del sito di DIGIT srl, all’indirizzo https://wom.social.

Accedendo a questo sito, Lei accetta i termini e le condizioni seguenti. Le chiediamo di non continuare a registrarti al servizio WOM nel caso in cui non fosse d’accordo con tutti i termini e le condizioni in questa pagina.

Licenza:

A meno che indicato altrimenti, DIGIT srl e/o gli affiliati con licenza detengono i diritti di proprietà intellettuale per tutto il materiale su WOM. Tutti i diritti di proprietà intellettuale sono riservati. 

Il presente accordo ha inizio dalla data di registrazione.

Responsabilità sui contenuti:

Non possiamo essere ritenuti responsabili per i contenuti presenti sul Suo sito. Accetta di proteggerci e difenderci da qualsiasi azione legale proveniente dal Suo sito. Non devono essere aggiunti collegamenti sul Suo sito che potrebbero essere interpretati come calunniosi, osceni, criminali o che infrangono, violano o suggeriscono la violazione di diritti di terzi.

Diritti riservati:

Ci riserviamo il diritto di richiedere la rimozione di tutti i collegamenti o di un collegamento specifico al nostro sito. Deve approvare immediatamente la richiesta di rimozione dei collegamenti. Ci riserviamo il diritto di modificare termini e condizioni, oltre che politica di collegamento in qualsiasi momento. Continuando a usare il nostro sito, accetta di essere vincolato dai presenti termini e condizioni.

Rimozione di collegamenti dal nostro sito:

Nel caso in cui un collegamento sul nostro sito sia offensivo per qualsiasi motivo, può contattarci e informarci in qualsiasi momento. Considereremo le richieste di rimozione dei collegamenti, tuttavia non siamo obbligati a completare la rimozione o rispondere direttamente.

Non garantiamo l’accuratezza delle informazioni presenti sul sito. Non garantiamo che le informazioni siano complete o precise, né promettiamo di assicurare che il sito resti disponibile o che il materiale sul sito venga costantemente aggiornato.

Esclusione di responsabilità:

Nella misura massima consentita dalla legge, escludiamo ogni rappresentanza, garanzia e condizione correlata al nostro sito e all’uso dello stesso. 

Le limitazioni e i divieti di responsabilità indicati in questa sezione e in altre parti di questa esclusione di responsabilità: (a) sono soggetti al paragrafo precedente; (b) governano tutte le responsabilità correlate a questa esclusione di responsabilità, incluse quelle correlate a contratto, torto o violazione di obblighi normativi.

Se sito, informazioni e servizi vengono forniti gratuitamente, non possiamo essere ritenuti responsabili per perdite o danni di qualsiasi natura.

OVERVIEW.TITLE: PRIVACY POLICIES
OVERVIEW.MAIN_CONTENT: You can find all the privacy policies for the WOM Platform and its applications in the side menu.

WEBSITE.TITLE: ‘WOM Website’ privacy policy
CONTENT: This privacy policy is conform to the General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”) 2016/679 and national data protection laws in Italy. It contains all information about the collection and treatment of data by the “WOM Website” (from now “the website”).
1. Data controller

The data controller, that is the entity that determines the purposes and the means of the processing of personal data, is DIGIT s.r.l., with registered address Corso Giuseppe Garibaldi 66, 61029, Urbino (PU).
Digit s.r.l. is a spin-off of Università degli Studi di Urbino “Carlo Bo” (University of Urbino, Italy).
2. Data subject to processing
The website does not handle nor collect any user data, except for IP addresses which are used for the purpose of data transmission and never stored nor logged.

The website allows users to register to the WOM platform as business entities (Merchants and Instruments). In order to register, users will supply a set of personal data required to process the registration of their profile (among which, name, surname, fiscal code or VAT number, e-mail address, etc.).
3. Purpose of processing

The WOM platform’s purpose is that of recognizing the social utility of activities performed by its users. In order to allow the generation and expenditure of WOM vouchers, which are used as proof of these activities, the system requires that entities that generate vouchers (Instruments) and that consume vouchers (Merchants) are registered.
4. Legal basis of the processing

The legal basis of data processing is provided by the freely expressed consent of the user, when registering to the WOM platform. Consent is provided exclusively for the purposes expressed at point 3 of this document.
5. Means of data collection
No user data is collected.
6. Duration of data storage
Personal data is never stored by the website.
7. Means of processing and transmission of data
No data is processed and transmitted
8. Third parties
The website includes scripts by Fathom Analytics, which comply with the GDPR and are subject to their own privacy notice.
9. Rights of the data subject
According to article 15 and following of the GDPR, the user has the following rights:
<ul>
• obtain confirmation of the existence of their personal data, accessing it and obtaining a copy of it (right of access);
• update, modify and/or correct their personal data (diritto di rectification);
• ask the removal or restriction of data processing, as determined by the GDPR (right of cancellation e right to restriction of the processing);
• oppose the processing, as determined by the GDPR (right to object),
• obtain a copy of the data in a common structured format and ask for it to be transmitted to a different Data controller, if technically feasible (right to portability).
The user also has the right of complaint to the supervisory authorities.
To exercise these rights, the user may contact the following e-mail address: info@digit.srl or write to the following address:

DIGIT s.r.l.
Corso Giuseppe Garibaldi, 66
61029, Urbino (PU)
c.a. Responsabile della protezione dati personali
6. Updates to the privacy policy
This document may be updated in the future. Refer to the last update date at the bottom of the document.

POCKET.TITLE: ‘WOM Pocket’ privacy policy
CONTENT: This privacy policy is conform to the General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”) 2016/679 and national data protection laws in Italy. It contains all information about the collection and treatment of data by the “WOM Pocket” application (from now “the app”).
The app allows users of the WOM platform to redeem, store, and make use of WOM vouchers.
1. Data controller

The data controller, that is the entity that determines the purposes and the means of the processing of personal data, is DIGIT s.r.l., with registered address Corso Giuseppe Garibaldi 66, 61029, Urbino (PU).
Digit s.r.l. is a spin-off of Università degli Studi di Urbino “Carlo Bo” (University of Urbino, Italy).
2. Data subject to processing
The app does not provide user registration, thus other personal information is never collected.

The app integrates Firebase Crashlytics, a Google service, for the improvement of the app and for recording crash data. Firebase Crashlytics gathers device information and usage statistics that are not bound to any user identity (among this data: unique Crashlytics installation IDs, Firebase installation IDs, crash stacktraces). No personal information is recorded at any time.
3. Purpose of processing

The WOM platform’s purpose is that of recognizing the social utility of activities performed by its users. The WOM Pocket app is completely anonymous and does not require user registration to be used. The app does not record personal information.
Data collected by Firebase Crashlytics is used to the purpose of improving the app and the platform.
4. Legal basis of the processing

The legal basis of data processing is provided by the freely expressed consent of the user, when installing and opening the app on their smartphone. The app provides information about the means and purposes of data processing and then asks for user permission, which is explicitly granted. Consent is provided exclusively for the purposes expressed at point 3 of this document.
5. Means of data collection
Statistical data handled by Firebase Crashlytics is automatically collected during app operation.
6. Duration of data storage
Data is collected only as long as the application is installed on the user’s device. Uninstalling the app will remove all collected data.
Statistical data handled by Firebase Crashlytics are stored according to the terms of service of Firebase Crashlytics, for the purposes expressed at point 3.
7. Means of processing and transmission of data
The app does not collect personal data and does not transmit it to third parties.
Statistical data handled by Firebase Crashlytics are stored according to the terms of service of Firebase Crashlytics, for the purposes expressed at point 3.
8. Rights of the data subject
According to article 15 and following of the GDPR, the user has the following rights:
<ul>
• obtain confirmation of the existence of their personal data, accessing it and obtaining a copy of it (right of access);
• update, modify and/or correct their personal data (diritto di rectification);
• ask the removal or restriction of data processing, as determined by the GDPR (right of cancellation e right to restriction of the processing);
• oppose the processing, as determined by the GDPR (right to object),
• obtain a copy of the data in a common structured format and ask for it to be transmitted to a different Data controller, if technically feasible (right to portability).
The user also has the right of complaint to the supervisory authorities.
To exercise these rights, the user may contact the following e-mail address: info@digit.srl or write to the following address:

DIGIT s.r.l.
Corso Giuseppe Garibaldi, 66
61029, Urbino (PU)
c.a. Responsabile della protezione dati personali
10. Updates to the privacy policy
This document may be updated in the future. Refer to the last update date at the bottom of the document.

POS.TITLE: ‘WOM Point of Service’ privacy policy
CONTENT: This privacy policy is conform to the General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”) 2016/679 and national data protection laws in Italy. It contains all information about the collection and treatment of data by the “WOM Point of Service” (or “WOM POS”) application (from now “the app”).
The app allows users of the WOM platform to access and manage their Merchant account and their offers.
1. Data controller

The data controller, that is the entity that determines the purposes and the means of the processing of personal data, is DIGIT s.r.l., with registered address Corso Giuseppe Garibaldi 66, 61029, Urbino (PU).
Digit s.r.l. is a spin-off of Università degli Studi di Urbino “Carlo Bo” (University of Urbino, Italy).
2. Data subject to processing

The app allows users to register to the WOM platform as business entities (Merchants). In order to register, users will supply a set of personal data required to process the registration of their profile (among which, name, surname, fiscal code or VAT number, e-mail address, etc.).

The app integrates Firebase Crashlytics, a Google service, for the improvement of the app and for recording crash data. Firebase Crashlytics gathers device information and usage statistics that are not bound to any user identity (among this data: unique Crashlytics installation IDs, Firebase installation IDs, crash stacktraces). No personal information is recorded at any time.
3. Purpose of processing

The WOM platform’s purpose is that of recognizing the social utility of activities performed by its users. In order to allow the generation and expenditure of WOM vouchers, which are used as proof of these activities, the system requires that entities that generate vouchers (Instruments) and that consume vouchers (Merchants) are registered.
Data collected by Firebase Crashlytics is used to the purpose of improving the app and the platform.
4. Legal basis of the processing

The legal basis of data processing is provided by the freely expressed consent of the user, when installing and opening the app on their smartphone. The app provides information about the means and purposes of data processing and then asks for user permission, which is explicitly granted. Consent is provided exclusively for the purposes expressed at point 3 of this document.
5. Means of data collection
User data is freely provided by the user during the registration process, which can be initiated through a specific page on the WOM website.
Statistical data handled by Firebase Crashlytics is automatically collected during app operation.
6. Duration of data storage
The data expressely provided for user registration and management of the user’s Merchant profile is stored as long as the user profile is maintained on the platform.
Statistical data handled by Firebase Crashlytics are stored according to the terms of service of Firebase Crashlytics, for the purposes expressed at point 3.
7. Means of processing and transmission of data

Data collected by the app and the platform is stored in a safe manner using state of the art technology. All data is transmitted only to authorized users through specific APIs (Application Programming Interfaces), for the purposes expressed at point 3, and is never automatically distributed through other means.
Statistical data handled by Firebase Crashlytics are stored according to the terms of service of Firebase Crashlytics, for the purposes expressed at point 3.
8. Rights of the data subject
According to article 15 and following of the GDPR, the user has the following rights:
<ul>
• obtain confirmation of the existence of their personal data, accessing it and obtaining a copy of it (right of access);
• update, modify and/or correct their personal data (diritto di rectification);
• ask the removal or restriction of data processing, as determined by the GDPR (right of cancellation e right to restriction of the processing);
• oppose the processing, as determined by the GDPR (right to object),
• obtain a copy of the data in a common structured format and ask for it to be transmitted to a different Data controller, if technically feasible (right to portability).
The user also has the right of complaint to the supervisory authorities.
To exercise these rights, the user may contact the following e-mail address: info@digit.srl or write to the following address:

DIGIT s.r.l.
Corso Giuseppe Garibaldi, 66
61029, Urbino (PU)
c.a. Responsabile della protezione dati personali
10. Updates to the privacy policy
This document may be updated in the future. Refer to the last update date at the bottom of the document.

WOMFIT.TITLE: ‘WOM Fit privacy policy
CONTENT: This privacy policy is conform to the General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”) 2016/679 and national data protection laws in Italy. It contains all information about the collection and treatment of data by the “WOM Stepcounter” application (from now “the app”).
The app enables the conversion of effort towards personal health and fitness into anonymous vouchers, through the “WOM Platform”.
1. Data controller

The data controller, that is the entity that determines the purposes and the means of the processing of personal data, is DIGIT s.r.l., with registered address Corso Giuseppe Garibaldi 66, 61029, Urbino (PU).
Digit s.r.l. is a spin-off of Università degli Studi di Urbino “Carlo Bo” (University of Urbino, Italy).
2. Data subject to processing

The app locally collects and locally processes data of the user’s fitness activities, such as they are exposed by the platform on which the app is installed by the user (Google Fitness for Android, Apple Healthkit for iOS).
The app does not provide user registration, thus other personal information is never collected.
3. Purpose of processing

The project enables territorial and local event marketing, through novel participation and rewarding mechanisms. The app recognizes the value of all those actions that have an intrinsic social value, such as fitness activities. These informations are collected and stored locally on the user’s device and they are never transmitted to any server nor shared with third parties.
4. Legal basis of the processing

The legal basis of data processing is provided by the freely expressed consent of the user, when installing and opening the app on their smartphone. The app provides information about the means and purposes of data processing and then asks for user permission, which is explicitly granted. Consent is provided exclusively for the purposes expressed at point 3 of this document.
5. Means of data collection

After installing and starting the app on the user’s device, the app will start collection information about the user’s fitness activities through the application programming interfaces provided by Google Fitness or Apple Healthkit, respectively on Android and iOS.
6. Duration of data storage
Data is collected only as long as the application is installed on the user’s device. Uninstalling the app will remove all collected data.
7. Means of processing and transmission of data

Data collected by the app is stored exclusively on the user’s device (using local data storage). The data stored is used to provide the user with a diary of their activities. Data is never transmitted.
8. Third parties
Data collected on the device’s memory (local data storage) is never transmitted to third parties.
9. Rights of the data subject
According to article 15 and following of the GDPR, the user has the following rights:
<ul>
• obtain confirmation of the existence of their personal data, accessing it and obtaining a copy of it (right of access);
• update, modify and/or correct their personal data (diritto di rectification);
• ask the removal or restriction of data processing, as determined by the GDPR (right of cancellation e right to restriction of the processing);
• oppose the processing, as determined by the GDPR (right to object),
• obtain a copy of the data in a common structured format and ask for it to be transmitted to a different Data controller, if technically feasible (right to portability).
The user also has the right of complaint to the supervisory authorities.
To exercise these rights, the user may contact the following e-mail address: info@digit.srl or write to the following address:

DIGIT s.r.l.
Corso Giuseppe Garibaldi, 66
61029, Urbino (PU)
c.a. Responsabile della protezione dati personali
10. Updates to the privacy policy
This document may be updated in the future. Refer to the last update date at the bottom of the document.

OVERVIEW.TITLE: List of applications for gaining WOMs
OVERVIEW.MAIN_CONTENT: WOM vouchers can be earned by voluntarily doing a socially useful action. For a WOM to be generated, the activity has to be formally acknowledged by the WOM platform.
OVERVIEW.CONTENT_A:
Volunteers can obtain WOMs through the use of specific applications that recognize the social value of their actions.
Check out the list of the applications in the side menu!

WOMFIT.TITLE: WOM Fit
WOMFIT.MAIN_CONTENT:
Keep track of the steps you take with WOM StepCounter, an app that rewards you for the things you do in your daily life!

Thanks to WOM StepCounter you will be able to convert your steps into digital vouchers, that reward social effort. You will receive vouchers if you keep track of more than 3.000 steps per day.

LIBRARIES.TITLE: Libraries
LIBRARIES.MAIN_CONTENT: The WOM platform rewards actions that have an intrinsic social value which translates into the enrichment of volunteers, as also their cultural growth and their education. Access to books and literature is instrumental for this purpose, which is often guaranteed by libraries and bookstores that stimulate individually citizens and can involve both schools and group activities. The WOM platform recognises how much value reading has as a vehicle for cultural and social growth, for both individuals and the community.
LIBRARIES.SECOND_TITLE: Libraries in Fano, the “city that reads“
LIBRARIES.SECOND_CONTENT:
Within the “ReadSharing: la lettura condivisa” project, financed by the “Città che legge 2020” initiative, a series of activities were launched to involve high school students, stimulating their approach to reading and making it become an experience of exchange and personal gratification.
The Biblioteca Federiciana and Mediateca Montanari of Fano contribute to the WOM platform by giving value to reading books, participating in reading groups or cultural events, creating digital contents and the participating in the project's editorials that have been activated along with the high schools of Fano.

UNIVERSITIES.TITLE: Universities
UNIVERSITIES.MAIN_CONTENT:
WOM is a project that acknowledges actions that have an intrinsic social value, and exactly because of this it recognizes the effort of each univeristy student in passing their exams Check out which universities will let you earn WOMs for each successful exam.
Click on the link of each university for more information:

AWORLD.TITLE: AWorld
AWORLD.MAIN_CONTENT:
AWorld is an App that promotes sustainable living in the modern world.
DIGIT SRL has teamed up with AWorld to convert your sustainable living actions into WOMs. Check out the following link for more information:

BALANCE.TITLE: Balance - Postural Stability
BALANCE.MAIN_CONTENT:
Balance - Postural Stability© is an application developed by researchers at the University of Urbino to evaluate your stability by investigating your stabilometric indices with just your smartphone.
Measure your postural stability every day to earn WOMs!
You can start collecting WOMs after doing a measurement in 2 different days.

CODYMAZE.TITLE: CodyMaze
CODYMAZE.MAIN_CONTENT:
An open-air chessboard of 25 blocks in which the students will move around like robots guided by the instructions that will appear gradually on the smartphone.
A labyrinth that is never the same, which appears different to each player and changes at each entry.
How to get out of it? By putting into practice the basic principles of coding that you assimilate even while playing!
Earn WOMs by having fun!
